Who is the murderer? Play Rules History
Error al cargar la partida Espera a otro jugador
HOW TO PLAY START
The game has: \n - 6 character cards \n - 6 weapon cards \n - 6 room cards \n
At the start the player will choose who wants to be between the characters.
GAME The player will choose one card of each type (character, weapon and room) then it will tap the “Suspect” button. \n If 1 or more between the chosen ones are wrong, one of them will be shown to the player. Next, the player will make a suspect suggestion again with another combination of cards. \n In case of choosing the 3 cards correctly, the player wins! \n \n At the beginning the elections of cards will be made randomly, but along the game continue and cards are shown it will be easier to find the cards involved in the murder.
